Text: The loader doesnt seem to function ... "Can't create Process"
The loader doesnt seem to function ... Can't create Process
GetFLV works fine here. No loader problems. Thanks for sharing.

....for those of you who don't know how this works
1. download / install
2. go to installation directory
3. copy / paste LOADER in installation directory
4. run LOADER as ADMINISTRATOR.  this will open the program
5. open keygen and register
6. holding rightclick, drag the loader to desktop
7. click "paste as new shortcut" 
8. right-click loader.  go to properties and set it up as "always run as admin" 
9. when you need to open the program.. run the loader..

thank you sooo much anacondaz / resurrection team, 
I really needed this program

followed your instructions. GetFLV can't seem to connect to register crack. :(

also, keep getting message "you need to have the latest Flash player. update now on internet explorer"

updated. still get message.
